message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,000 significantly undervalues the product's worth. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $10,250?
